title: Hexatrek : The long distance thru hike in France

title: How the Japanese Practice of “Forest Bathing”—Or Just Hanging Out in the Wo
excerpt: When the U.S. media began reporting on the phenomenon of “forest bathing” as a therapy for mental and physical health, the online commentariat—as it will—mocked the concept relentlessly as yet another pretentious, bourgeois repackaging of something thoroughly mundane.
